37.eng-name: The Book of Fighting [The Prohibition of Bloodshed]

hadiths.text: It was narrated from Ibrahim bin Muhammad bin Talhah that he heard 'Abdullah bin 'Amr narrating:From the Prophet [SAW], that he said: "If a person's wealth is sought without right, and he fights (to protect it) and is killed, he is a martyr

chapter.eng-name: The One Who is Killed Defending His Wealth
